## GridComponent.setGridPluginInstances() method

Sets GridPluginInstances into GridPlugin

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setGridPluginInstances(plugin: GridPlugin): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  plugin | <code>GridPlugin</code> | Grid plugin to be filled with grid GridPluginInstances |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
